Summary: A bright star moving from south west to north east direction suddenly disappeared and twinkle like stars frequently about
divs: Sighting DetailsI have seen in the night sky a bright star moving from south west to north east direction then suddenly disappeared and changed directions towards north and then to south and twinkles like stars frequently in for about 20 minutes.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Adichanalloor
